apps.title: Wave: Small Business Software
apps.description: Wave’s mobile app is an integrated, on-the-go solution for small business owners, creators, freelancers, consultants, and contractors in the US and Canada and the perfect companion to your desktop experience. Send customized, professional invoices and estimates and keep track of your business expenses in one place! Add optional online credit card and bank payment processing to get paid even faster. Plus, subscribe to our Pro Plan to access even more bookkeeping and invoicing features. Our receipts feature is included for free in the Pro Plan or easy to add-on to the Starter Plan. You can capture unlimited receipts with optical character recognition to track your business expenses. Bookkeep better with the Pro Plan Want to look more polished, save more time, and conquer cash flow? With our Pro Plan, you get access to the following features: Capture unlimited receipts and track expenses at no additional cost Option to accept online payments* at a discounted rate Auto-import bank transactions** Auto-merge and categorize bank transactions Add additional users to your account Automate late payment reminders Access live-person chat and email support And more! You’re in good company Wave’s software has helped more than 300K North American small business owners manage their money, so you know we’ve got your back. Dashboard Easily monitor what’s going on in your business with Wave’s intuitive dashboard, which includes: At-a-glance business insights, like profit and loss statements Quick access to invoicing metrics, like amounts overdue and upcoming payments Access to accounting reports for understanding your business, filing taxes, and more Mobile invoicing Create and send professional, customized invoices with your logo Receive notifications when you've been paid Check invoice status (sent, viewed, overdue, paid) Record payments Send invoice reminders and payment receipts Get paid even faster with Wave’s online payments feature to accept credit cards and bank payments Synchronize instantly with your Wave account on desktop Estimates Instantly create and send estimates and land that dream customer quicker Convert an estimate into an invoice in seconds Customize estimates with your brand colors and logo Access your estimates from anywhere, anytime Designed to get you paid faster Wave invoice templates and email messages are designed to help you get paid faster Sending professional easy-to-read invoices inspires confidence from your clients, encouraging prompt payment and repeat business Receipt scanning Organize and manage your receipts in one place with Wave’s subscription-based mobile receipts feature Don’t waste time manually managing your expenses—let our app capture receipt details in seconds using OCR technology Get peace of mind and breeze through tax season with updated books and reports, synced with our accounting feature Upload receipts from your desktop or via email Manage and categorize transactions on-the-go or on desktop—everything stays synced! Accept online payments in seconds Wave’s invoicing software works seamlessly to accept online payments via direct integration with our online payments feature: Getting started is as easy as a few clicks*. You’ll be able to select the invoices where you want to accept all major credit cards (Visa®, MasterCard®, American Express®, Discover®) for a competitive, per transaction fee. Most Wave invoices paid by credit card and bank payment get paid in 2 days or less! Create your Wave account right in the Wave mobile app, or visit waveapps.com. *Approval is subject to eligibility criteria, including identity verification and credit review. **Not all financial institutions are supported. Learn more here: https://support.waveapps.com/hc/en-us/articles/115005541303-Understanding-bank-connections Privacy: https://www.waveapps.com/legal/privacy-policy Terms of Use: https://www.waveapps.com/legal/terms-of-use Terms of Service: https://www.waveapps.com/legal/legal-disclosures

apps.title: Podium - Small Business Tools
apps.description: Podium® is a communications and marketing platform that helps small local businesses manage all customer communications in one easy-to-use inbox, from collecting payments to managing your online reputation and reviews. Podium is changing the way local business gets done everywhere. More than 100,000 businesses rely on Podium to grow and do more as a team. Key features include: - Inbox: Bring every customer conversation from every channel into a single, easy-to-use inbox. See and respond to every chat, review, text, social media message, and phone call in a single thread. - Reviews: Double your monthly review volume in less than 60 days and increase website and foot traffic to your business by sending review invitations via text through Podium. - Bulk Messaging: With a 98% open rate, Podium’s text marketing software allows you to send tailored messages to your customer base that turn into customer sales in minutes. - Phones: Don't let missed calls fall through the cracks, with a singular business number for calls and texting you can keep all communications in one place and avoid everyone give out their personal number to customers. - Payments: Get paid with just a text. Payments through Podium gather more reviews, generate higher quality leads, and centralize your customer data to communicate and market in a more targeted way.

apps.title: Quantic School of Business
apps.description: WHAT IS QUANTIC? Quantic is a highly selective, accredited, mobile-first business school, offering radically affordable MBA and Executive MBA degrees as true alternatives to elite campus programs. Download the app to sample free introductory lessons and then join the thousands of students and alumni around the world who have discovered our fast, focused, comprehensive business degrees to accelerate their career. WHAT’S DIFFERENT ABOUT QUANTIC? Unlike most online learning programs that broadcast boring, passive video professors, our engaging Active Learning method brings learning to life with bite-size, fun, intuitive lessons. You’ll be amazed at the speed to acquire new knowledge as well as the retention of it over time! Quantic lessons reinforce concepts, and provide examples, feedback, and new perspectives—the perfect resource to master and then apply business skills. WHAT IS THE QUANTIC COMMUNITY? Beyond the open introductory lessons in the app available to everyone, accepted degree program students work together in a social learning environment online with the option of attending student events in cities around the world. Our global network of learners are our greatest advocates, pioneers and the business leaders of the future. WHAT WILL YOU LEARN WITH QUANTIC? Aligned with the world's leading business schools, our degrees comprise courses across 9 core business concentrations including Finance, Marketing, Management and Entrepreneurship. Each concentration contains numerous courses, with up to 120 interactive, feedback-based lessons between 5 and 10 minutes in duration. Lesson topics include: Reading Financial Statements The Art of Negotiation Microeconomics: Supply & Demand Macroeconomics: Monetary Policy Digital Marketing Fundamentals Statistics & Regression Analysis Equity & Market Valuations Supply Chain Management Mergers & Acquisitions Venture Capital Funding Plus, new courses are added all the time! WHO SHOULD DOWNLOAD QUANTIC? Download Quantic if you have an interest in switching careers, getting ahead in your career, and generally improving your business knowledge and skills in a fun, intuitive way. WHAT ARE PEOPLE SAYING ABOUT QUANTIC? • ”In my 10 years in the education world, Quantic offers the best, most engaging learning experience of anything I’ve seen." Michael Horn, Co-Founder, Clayton Christensen Institute • ”Wonderful way of teaching in the best possible way in the least possible time!" - Prerana, Quantic Student • ”GREAT stuff! Love the way the info is divided into digestible chunks. The animations are really beautiful, easy and fun. LOVE THIS!" - Kate, Quantic Student • ”The interactive format makes learning/review more interesting and allows for better retention of key concepts. So much better than reading from a textbook!" - Richmond, Quantic Student • “I’ve been living under a rock - @QuanticMBA decodes [online] study for people like me who have short attention spans. #NoVideosOrPPTs” – MBA candidate 2015, INSEAD • “…I want to begin each day going through this program…” – MBA candidate • “I love [the] courses! They are super interactive, and I love the touch of humor you guys put into the cases, it definitely makes it much more fun and interesting. Love it!” – Valerie, entrepreneur • “Excellent on the go learning app. Excellent way of teaching…” – Mohsin, business learner • “… It is interactive, fun and does not over-complicate things, perfect for me….!” – MBA candidate Class of 2016, INSEAD WHAT ARE THE REQUIREMENTS TO USE THE QUANTIC APP? To use Quantic you must be connected to the Internet. We recommend a 3G, 4G or Wi-Fi connection for optimal use of the Quantic mobile app

Quantic lessons reinforce concepts, and provide examples, feedback, and new perspectives—the perfect resource to master and then apply business skills. WHAT IS THE QUANTIC COMMUNITY? Download Quantic if you have an interest in switching careers, getting ahead in your career, and generally improving your business knowledge and skills in a fun, intuitive way. apps.title: Skype for Business
apps.description: Skype for Business, formerly Lync 2013 for iOS, extends the power of Lync and Skype to your favorite mobile device: voice & video over wireless, rich presence, instant messaging, conferencing, and calling features from a single, easy-to-use interface. Key Features: Initiate a group IM or video conversation and invite additional participants Join, rejoin and initiate a Skype for Business Meeting to communicate and collaborate on amazing ideas Simultaneously view shared content and speaker's video during a conference Control the meeting (mute or remove attendees) and know more about participants’ modalities Look at your upcoming meetings and join via one click Find your recent conversations and pick them up from where you left off Search your contacts by name, email, or phone number Enhanced security via Active Directory Authentication Library Anyone can use the Skype for Business for iOS app when invited to a Skype for Business or Lync 2013 meeting. However, you must have a Skype for Business or Lync account in order to use (and enjoy) the full capability of the Skype for Business app. Also, some functionality might require an update to Lync or Skype for Business Server or might not be available to all users. If you’re not sure about your account status, please contact your IT department. IMPORTANT: THIS SOFTWARE REQUIRES CONNECTIVITY TO VALIDLY LICENSED COPIES OF MICROSOFT LYNC OR SKYPE FOR BUSINESS SERVER OR OFFICE 365 / LYNC ONLINE / SKYPE FOR BUSINESS ONLINE AND WILL NOT WORK WITHOUT IT. UPDATES TO MICROSOFT LYNC SERVER OR SKYPE FOR BUSINESS MAY BE REQUIRED FOR PROPER PERFORMANCE. SOME FUNCTIONALITY MAY NOT BE AVAILABLE IN ALL COUNTRIES. IF YOU ARE UNSURE ABOUT YOUR COMPANY’S LICENSE TO AND/OR DEPLOYMENT OF LYNC OR SKYPE FOR BUSINESS, PLEASE CONTACT YOUR IT DEPARTMENT. SKYPE FOR BUSINESS APP IS ONLY AVAILBLE FOR iOS 8.0 OR GREATER.

apps.title: TurboTax: File Your Tax Return
apps.description: "FILE NOW—EVEN AFTER THE DEADLINE. • Missed the 2024 tax deadline or still need to file? We can help. TurboTax lets you e-file, right on your phone, until October 31, 2025 at 9 PM PST. IRS late penalties may apply. • No lines. No waiting. With TurboTax Live Full Service, an expert can do your taxes from start to finish as soon as today. CHOOSE HOW MUCH EXPERT HELP YOU WANT • TurboTax Live Full Service - Let an expert do your taxes start to finish. They can even file your taxes as soon as today! Get matched with an expert based on your unique tax situation. They’ll handle your taxes from start to finish, in real time, and only sign and file when they know your return is 100% correct and you’re getting the best outcome possible (1). • TurboTax Live Assisted - File your own taxes, with on-demand expert help as you go. Experts can answer your questions, explain your taxes, and help you fix any mistakes. Once you’re done, get an expert final review so you know it’s done 100% right (1). • File your own taxes with confidence - Add your forms and answer a few simple questions, then we’ll guide you from there. When you’re done, CompleteCheckTM reviews your return for 100% accuracy, guaranteed (1). • TurboTax Free Edition - $0 federal returns + $0 state returns = $0 to file. ~37% of taxpayers qualify. Simple Form 1040 returns only (no schedules except for Earned Income Tax Credit, Child Tax Credit and Student Loan Interest). (2) DONE RIGHT, HOWEVER YOU CHOOSE TO FILE • TAX RETURN LIFETIME GUARANTEE: Whether you get expert help or file yourself, you’ll get your max refund, 100% accuracy, and audit support for your return’s full 7-year lifetime, guaranteed (1). • DONE RIGHT, WITH OUR TAX EXPERTS: When you work with a TurboTax Live tax expert, you get so much more behind the scenes. Like specialized tax analysts arming your expert with the latest deductions and credits and our quality review team that proactively scans for accuracy. FILE EASILY WITH SPECIAL APP FEATURES • File 30% faster on our app!* • Get started quickly with easy info uploads. Snap a photo, upload your docs, or import your forms directly from your employer or financial institution, and we’ll auto-fill your info. • Spanish-language support: You can now toggle between English and Spanish and file your taxes in your preferred language. Bilingual experts are also available to help you file your taxes or do them for you. ALREADY FILED? WE'RE STILL HERE TO HELP • TurboTax Live customers get unlimited expert help year-round, at no extra cost • Need to amend? We can help you accurately file your amended taxes easily and with confidence. DISCLAIMERS *On average, customers using our mobile app take 30% less time to complete their taxes compared to time taken on our website 1. Guarantees: See terms of service or turbotax.com/guarantees for full details. 2. TurboTax Free Edition: TurboTax Free Edition is available for those filing simple Form 1040 returns and limited credits only (no forms or schedules except for the Earned Income Tax Credit, Child Tax Credit and student loan interest), as detailed in the TurboTax Free Edition disclosures. Roughly 37% of taxpayers qualify. Offer may change or end at any time without notice. 3. Intuit is an independent company with no affiliation to any government entity. This TurboTax app also doesn't represent any government entity. The websites for the IRS: https://www.irs.gov, as well as state & local tax authorities listed here: https://ttlc.intuit.com/turbotax-support/en-us/help-article/state-taxes/contact-state-department-revenue/L9qVToi02_US_en_US are the source of information for specific tax requirements. Intuit has offices worldwide, and is headquartered in Mountain View, 2700 Coast Ave, Mountain View, CA 94043."

apps.title: Investor's Business Daily
apps.description: Winning stock lists, real-time charts and up-to-the-minute market news: now available everywhere, thanks to the newly enhanced Investor’s Business Daily app. Investor's Business Daily is proud to have been named "Best Financial Research and Data Company" in the 2023 FinTech Breakthrough Award program. IBD Digital members now have access to their favorite premium features, IBD premium lists, charts and personal stock lists. Not an IBD member? You’ll still be able to keep up with market news, videos and information like you would on Investors.com. Features: • Your personal stock lists, now synced across all your devices • Access to premium features for all IBD Digital members • Exclusive stock lists like IBD 50, Sector Leaders, IPO Leaders and more • The latest daily market analysis with The Big Picture and Stock Market Today • Customizable stock list on the home screen • Personalized news pages with embedded videos to keep you up-to-date on stocks you’re watching • Tap stock symbols to see IBD’s exclusive Smart Select Ratings • A widget accessible on your device home screen lets you create a personal stock list to see mini-charts, current price/volume and ratings. • A native iOS login screen so you can use Face ID/Touch ID. The IBD app is free to download but IBD Digital subscribers get access to premium ratings and interactive tools. IBD Digital subscription gives you unlimited access to our stock research and analysis across multiple devices—mobile, Mac and PC. After the one month free trial, your membership will automatically renew each month/year, and you will be charged $34.99/month or $329.99/year through your iTunes account within 24-hours prior to the end of the current cycle. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings up until 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your subscription remains active until the end of the period. Try us free for 1 month! If you enjoy your IBD Digital trial, do nothing and your membership will automatically renew every month or every year, depending on your choice of subscription. Digital Subscription Options: Monthly - unlimited access for $34.99 per month. Cancel anytime. Annual - unlimited access for $329.99 per year (save $89.89). Cancel anytime. If you subscribe via iTunes: Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at the confirmation of purchase. Accounts will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period at the rate of the selected plan above. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. If you have any questions about how the app functions or how to access to your subscription on other devices, please contact us at (800) 831-2525 or outside the United States at (310) 448-6600. Privacy policy: https://www.investors.com/investors-business-daily-privacy-policy/ Term of use: https://www.investors.com/home/investors-business-daily-inc-terms-of-use/

apps.title: Business Match: Social App
apps.description: Our mission is to match entrepreneurs with the best experts for fast business growth. Business Match – Your Shortcut to Business Growth Our mission is simple: match entrepreneurs with the best experts to overcome barriers and grow faster. Every business faces challenges. Finding clients, building a strong brand, raising investments, or scaling processes — these barriers slow down growth. With Business Match, you don’t have to solve them alone. Just describe your business need, and the app will instantly connect you with entrepreneurs, experts, and investors who can help. 1) Real solutions, not just profiles → Instead of endless swiping, Business Match delivers people who can solve your exact barrier — from getting new clients to preparing for investments or automating your processes. 2) 50,000+ entrepreneurs & experts already inside → founders, marketers, consultants, and investors who are actively seeking collaborations and deals. 3) Verified expertise & proven cases → Ratings, reviews, and success stories show you who actually delivers results, so you can build trust fast. 4) From local to global growth → Connect with people nearby to meet in person, or scale your network internationally with one click. 5) Community built for fast business growth → join a dynamic ecosystem where every connection brings you closer to your next milestone.

apps.title: Square Invoices: Invoice Maker
apps.description: Square Invoices is a must-have invoicing solution to run your business: invoice and estimate maker, and a secure, fast payment system. It is an essential invoicing solution that efficiently supports any type of business: ► Home & Repair: Contractors, Cleaning, Automotive, Landscaping ► Food & Drink: Catering, Bakery, Food Trucks, Wholesale Stores ► Professional Services: Web Designers, Photographers, Consultants, Accountants, Architects, Interior Designers, Advertising, Real Estate It has everything you need to run your business on the go: estimates, contacts, invoices, payments, automatic reminders and real-time tracking and reporting. It’s all in one app, and there are no monthly fees. Bill customers with a simple invoice app that also makes sending estimates or requesting deposits easy. Access Square Invoices on your iPhone, iPad or desktop. ► INVOICE AND ESTIMATE MAKER Send professional invoices and estimates in three simple steps: just enter your customer’s email, the amount, and hit send. Customise the look and easily attach photos, contracts, or receipts. ► ACCEPT ANY KIND OF PAYMENT Cut collection times from weeks to days by giving your customers more convenient ways to pay—no more stamps or envelopes. Customers can pay online or in person with any major debit or credit card, Apple Pay or Google Pay, cash, check or ACH Payment. ► REACH CUSTOMERS MORE EFFECTIVELY Send invoices wherever your customers prefer—email, URL, text / SMS, manually through any messaging app, or print out a hard copy. Customers can easily pay on their phone or computer from anywhere. ► AUTOMATIC REMINDERS AND TRACKING Stop chasing down payments with automatic payment reminders and transparent tracking that tells you the moment each invoice is viewed and paid. ► FLEXIBLE BILLING Get paid on your schedule by requesting a deposit or setting up recurring invoices for weekly or monthly billing. Customers can also authorize Square to securely save their payment cards on file to be charged automatically. Whether you are sending a quote to confirm your next freelance job, requesting a deposit for a custom order, or billing for your contractor hours, Square Invoices is the all-in-one app for your payment and workflow needs. Download and set up your account in just minutes.

apps.title: Business tour
apps.description: Business Tour is a free desktop online game. Gather a team of up to 4 people, play multiplayer games with friends online, complete daily tasks, participate in tournaments with other players, and exchange rewards with future profits. EASY START, CHALLENGING PATH TO THE TOP Business Tour allows you to play online games with friends. The main advantage of this game is that it's easy to learn but challenging to win. You'll need to use your sharp mind and entrepreneurial talent to outwit other players and become kings of the board. The game is complex and unpredictable, making it engaging and the gameplay diverse. PLAY WITH FRIENDS OR SOLO You can play this game solo against three opponents, invite your friends for team games and compete with two strangers, or invite all your friends to show them who the real business and city-building sharks are. Your main weapon is strategy in this free game board. It doesn't matter whether you or your friends are novices or experienced business sharks; the right strategy will save you even in the most dire situations in this city-building game. CREATE YOUR UNIQUE STYLE You can play aggressively or cautiously, choose a moderate monopolistic strategy, go all-in, or combine everything to create a city mania. But how will other players remember you on the monopoly game field? Choose from over 100 unique characters and dice and become the most recognizable monopolist in the world of "Business Tour." You can be a fun pigeon person with ice cube dice in a big city or an inflatable superhero throwing dice in a mystical human game. Or maybe you prefer the classics? Then classic characters with traditional gaming mania are perfect for you to build your city. Collect rent and create your own corporation! COMPETE EVERY DAY If you love competitions, free games, and challenges, you can compete with others on the player rankings based on the number of chips in the game on YouTube. Be sure to test your best business skills, tactics, and strategic plans to be at the top of the rankings and the star ratings in megapolises, metropolises, and city horizons by the end of the month. Receive rewards for these achievements and plan your tactics ahead for the next month on the game board! And if you have any questions about the game, you can go through a detailed tutorial. Don't hesitate to reach out to our support master for assistance and problem-solving. Key features: Online multiplayer, 2-4 players Regular tournaments Option to link Steam and Google accounts Daily rewards Over 100 unique characters and dice Leaderboards Daily tasks Private tables with ID access Offline mode with bots Local mode with other players on one screen Terms of Service: https://8floor.net/tos/

apps.title: RepCard-Digital Business Cards
apps.description: Build your reputation and make more money with RepCard’s powerful tools and features, all designed to help you close more sales, without spending any extra time or energy than you already are. If you are in field sales and you are looking for that extra edge that will help you close more sales and make more money, then RepCard is the ABSOLUTE, EASIEST way to do it. All you must do is leave your RepCard with leads and the app automatically follows up with them. Using pre-scheduled, customizable sales campaigns that allow you to put your follow up efforts completely on auto pilot. Just set it, forget it, and watch as the leads you would usually never give a second thought to, start turning into closed deals. Custom Landing Page Simply tell us who you and your company are and we will tell the world. Create your custom RepCard with images, videos, links, referrals, and reviews in minutes. The best part is that you can update at any time without relying on a webmaster and at a fraction of the cost. Share With Anyone: No app required on the receiving end. You could share your RepCard with anyone through regular text, messenger, WhatsApp, or just about any other popular method. The best part is that once they click on the link, you get all their contact info as well. Automated Follow Up Campaigns: You can create your own personalized follow up cadence, that can be shared automatically through text or email. Create a simple preset follow up process and never forget to follow up with a potential sale again. Smart Interaction Notifications: Get instantly notified every time anyone of your contacts interacts with your RepCard. So, you are aware of who is showing interest in what you have to offer and you can react right away. Generate Automated Referrals: Get more referrals from new and past customers, without even saying a word to them. RepCard does the asking for you automatically. In addition, anytime someone shares your contact info with a friend, you are notified who that person is, as soon as they click on your RepCard. Produce Automatic Reviews: We automatically work to get positive customer reviews that build your reputation and give you instant credibility and confidence with prospects as soon as they open their doors. In addition to an automated customer review process, we also have built in a strategic location for them to be viewed by potential clients. Pipeline Management Tools: We take the guess and leg work out of managing a sales pipeline effectively. This part of the sales process is so important and that is why we went the extra mile to have it covered. Just imagine, that every time someone interacts with your RepCard, the contact gets moved to your hot list and you can manually move leads from different sales stages as well. Canvassing Tool: Take advantage of our super easy to use canvassing tool. You can select any specific area, assign it to yourself or a team member and you will obtain many details about the leads in the selected area. This way you will already know many details about your prospect, before you initiate contact. Apart from us Integrating automatically with over 5K apps we also have many custom features for companies looking to take their sales team to the next level: Custom Company Branding, Team Optimization, Shareable Team Libraries, Review generator, Custom User verification page, White label option, Admin Controls, Company Analytics dashboard, Detailed mapping tool and Leaderboard to mention a few. We are so confident that RepCard is such a game changer that you can become a Freemium customer today and use RepCard free forever. However, for those looking to grab the bull by the horns, you can take advantage of our Premium Pricing and unlock additional features to help you start closing more sales today!

apps.title: Zoho CRM - Sales & Marketing
apps.description: Zoho CRM empowers empowers over 300,000 businesses across the world businesses in over 180 countries. It helps businesses engage with customers, convert more leads, and grow their revenue by closing more deals. Oversee your sales on the move with the Zoho CRM mobile app. Whether you're a sales rep making calls, a sales manager monitoring the sales pipeline, or a business owner nurturing your business, approach your workday efficiently with a state-of-the- art mobile CRM system. Your mobile CRM app not only covers your CRM software requirements on the go but also helps boost mobile sales productivity with features like search, call, email, check-in, near-me, and notifications. With a highly fluid, interactive interface, offline access, and the ability to sync data across all your devices automatically, Zoho's mobile CRM is perfect for field sales. Features : - Get a clear overview of your scheduled tasks, meetings, and calls. Set reminders so that you never miss out on a single one. - Use the powerful global search to locate anything you need. - Review notes and attachments before heading out for important meetings. - Locate customers and sales opportunities nearby and navigate. - Check in at a client's location to record your visit. - Know who's calling with the Caller ID feature. - Log calls and capture the details of your conversation with ease by attaching voice notes. - Visualize sales and marketing trends and make decisions while you're away from your desk. - Collaborate with your team in real-time using Feeds and @mention colleagues on posts. - Sync your data automatically across all platforms without worrying about network connectivity. If you have any questions or comments, please write to us at crm@zohomobile.com. We'll be happy to help. Oversee your sales on the move with the Zoho CRM mobile app. Whether you're a sales rep making calls, a sales manager monitoring the sales pipeline, or a business owner nurturing your business, approach your workday efficiently with a state-of-the- art mobile CRM system. Your mobile CRM app not only covers your CRM software requirements on the go but also helps boost mobile sales productivity with features like search, call, email, check-in, near-me, and notifications. With a highly fluid, interactive interface, offline access, and the ability to sync data across all your devices automatically, Zoho's mobile CRM is perfect for field sales. Features : - Get a clear overview of your scheduled tasks, meetings, and calls. Set reminders so that you never miss out on a single one. - Use the powerful global search to locate anything you need. - Review notes and attachments before heading out for important meetings. - Locate customers and sales opportunities nearby and navigate. - Check in at a client's location to record your visit. - Know who's calling with the Caller ID feature. - Log calls and capture the details of your conversation with ease by attaching voice notes. - Visualize sales and marketing trends and make decisions while you're away from your desk. - Collaborate with your team in real-time using Feeds and @mention colleagues on posts. - Sync your data automatically across all platforms without worrying about network connectivity. If you have any questions or comments, please write to us at crm@zohomobile.com. We'll be happy to help. apps.title: Comcast Business
apps.description: AVAILABLE TO COMCAST BUSINESS CUSTOMERS Access your Comcast Business account anytime and anywhere with the Comcast Business App—an innovative, all-in-one tool designed with your business in mind. With streamlined navigation and an intuitive layout, the Comcast Business App makes it easier than ever to manage your account on the go, right from your mobile device. With the Comcast Business App, you can: • Manage your account details • View upcoming service appointments • Pay your bill, view past invoices, and manage your payment methods • Enroll in Auto Pay and Paperless Billing • Manage WiFi networks, hotspots, and more • Set up notifications for billing and service requests • Stay up-to-date on your service status • View your TV channel lineup • Forward calls to your home, mobile phone, or colleagues with Call Forwarding • Troubleshoot technical issues in a few easy steps • Access Comcast Business Support These features are available to Business Internet, Business TV, Business Voice, Business Voice Mobility, Business VoiceEdge™, and/or Business VoiceEdge Select™ customers and will vary depending on your services. Comcast Business Voice Mobility, Business VoiceEdge®, and Business VoiceEdge Select™ customers can also: • Easily host a conference call for up to 50 participants (Business VoiceEdge® customers only) • View recent calls, listen to and manage voicemail, and customize greetings • Make outgoing calls through the app to display your business phone number on caller IDs • Quickly transfer calls to colleagues or third parties • Forward calls to your home, mobile phone, or colleagues with Call Forwarding • Quickly move active calls to your Be Anywhere devices and desk phones • Select the phones that will ring on inbound calls by managing Be Anywhere devices • Easily manage security settings These features will vary depending on your services. You can submit feedback to CBMA_Feedback@comcast.com

apps.title: SoCard: Digital Business Card
apps.description: Seamlessly add your business card to your Apple Wallet, which is compatible with iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch. Social Card revolutionizes how you share your contact information when you meet someone new. Built for business owners, social influencers, and anyone aiming to modernize their networking. Get Started Today! Download Social Card and join thousands of professionals who are modernizing their networking experience. WHY SOCIAL CARD? Having a business card is a requirement. However, keeping one ready in your wallet is a hassle. Not having one when you need it is even worse. Social Card helps you digitize your business cards so they are always ready to network everywhere you take your Apple devices. What you'll love about Social Card: - Apple Wallet Integration: Store and access your card in your Apple Wallet like an airline boarding pass. - Effortless Sharing: Your business card is just a click away on your lock screen. You don't need to open an app to share your information, making the process quick and easy. - Comprehensive Contact Sharing: Our advanced contact cards allow you to share all the essential information in one go, eliminating the need for manual contact entry and ensuring every contact card is completed. - Links: More than just contact cards. Link to websites, social media profiles, phone numbers, emails, and more. - Friendly Interface: Getting your business cards to look pixel-perfect should be easy. We've built a simple guided user interface to help you start networking as soon as possible. FREE Version Includes: - One FREE Social Card. - Pre-selected colors. - Custom headshot image. - Custom QR code. - Daily card updates. PREMIUM Version Unlocks: - One-time payment. No subscriptions. - Unlimited card updates. - Custom colors to match your brand. - Add your own logo. - Advanced contact card fields (photo, links, and more customizations) - Offline contact cards. Start building your Social Card today and enhance your networking! Contact Us: Have questions? Visit joinsocialcard.com/contact

apps.title: Payoneer - Business Payments
apps.description: Take Control of Your Global Payments with Payoneer Manage your business payments from anywhere with Payoneer, the ultimate platform for global payment solutions. Tailored for small to medium-sized businesses (SMBs), corporate entities, and entrepreneurs, Payoneer makes international money transfers and online payment processing seamless, secure, and cost-effective. Why Choose Payoneer? Receive Payments Globally. Effortlessly send money overseas or receive payments in popular currencies like USD, EUR, GBP, JPY, and more. With Payoneer, you’ll gain access to international payment gateway solutions specifically designed for SMBs. Withdraw funds to your local business bank account in over 150 countries or access them instantly using your Payoneer card. Simplify Payments for Businesses Whether you’re paying service providers, suppliers, or contractors, Payoneer’s payment solutions ensure smooth, reliable transactions in over 200 countries. Enjoy fast and affordable digital payment options that help you avoid high fees and delays—allowing your business to operate efficiently. Manage Finances with Ease Track and control your finances on the go. From monitoring payments to managing balances across multiple currencies, Payoneer provides tools that enhance your financial flexibility and reliability. Competitive currency conversion rates empower you to pay suppliers in their preferred currencies while maximizing your cost savings. Expand Your Business with Confidence Leverage seller-specific features like VAT payments in multiple countries and working capital offers for platforms like Amazon and Walmart. Easily scale your business with immediate access to funds while ensuring ongoing cash flow efficiency. Why Download the Payoneer App? The Payoneer app makes managing your global payment solutions more convenient than ever. Oversee international money transfers and monitor payment solutions directly from your smartphone, bringing flexibility to your financial operations. Reliable Customer Support Our multilingual team is available 24/7 to assist with your digital payment solutions in over 20 languages. Whether you’re troubleshooting or have questions, we’re always just a click away. Get Started Today Join millions of businesses worldwide already using Payoneer to simplify their international money transfers and enhance their growth. Download the app now to unlock the power of a truly efficient global payment platform!

What is a Virtual Phone System? An easy, flexible, and affordable way for entrepreneurs and small businesses to connect with customers. Virtual phone systems are cloud-based and include modern features like text messaging and mobile apps. VoIP apps for calling and texting are much cheaper than traditional business phone systems. What is a Virtual Phone Number? Virtual phone numbers, like email, are 'in the cloud'. They work seamlessly across all of your devices - office phones, cell phones, computers, and landlines. Teams can share a single virtual number too. They come in local & toll-free area codes and are portable. apps.title: HiHello: Digital Business Card
apps.description: HiHello: The Best Digital Business Card App Join the future of networking with HiHello, the leading digital business card app trusted by professionals worldwide. With over a million biz cards shared monthly, HiHello is your essential tool for building and managing valuable business connections. BEAUTIFUL & CUSTOMIZABLE BUSINESS CARD MAKER - Make and personalize interactive virtual business cards with different templates, designs, and colors. - Create stunning free electronic business cards with profile photos, or transform your vcard into a video business card. - Add unlimited content, include links, social media, video, PDF, payment apps, and more. EFFORTLESS SHARING - Share your card with anyone, even if they don’t have the HiHello app. - Share with a branded QR code, link, email, SMS, iMessage, Apple Watch, Apple Wallet, Siri, widget, lock screen widgets, social media, Airdrop, NFC, and more. BUSINESS CONTACT MANAGER - Your virtual Rolodex that helps you keep track of everyone you meet. - Manage your contact list with automated sorting, notes and tags to organize, and a timeline of who you met and when in the smart address book. - Easily save any HiHello contacts into your phone or preferred contact manager. AI-POWERED BUSINESS CARD READER, SCANNER, AND TRANSCRIPTION - Instantly capture any paper card lead with the AI-powered business card scanner. - Built on multiple AI models with a human verification backup if needed, HiHello is the most accurate business card scanner app. VIRTUAL BACKGROUNDS - Stay on brand in every meeting or presentation with custom virtual backgrounds that link to your smart business cards for virtual meetings or live streaming. - Create personalized, branded backgrounds with a photo from our library, or upload your own. - Share what you want with your audience by creating a specific card and virtual background QR code for your meeting or presentation. EMAIL SIGNATURES - Create professional, interactive, attention-grabbing signatures that are compatible with any email platform and correspond to your business card of choice. - Choose from multiple templates and styles. ANALYTICS - Gain valuable insights into card usage, engagement, and lead generation with in-app analytics and data integrations. INTEGRATIONS - Integrate HiHello with the systems that matter most, including SSO, Active Directory, and CRMs like Salesforce and Hubspot. SECURITY & PRIVACY - HiHello is SOC 2 Type 2 compliant and meets the privacy requirements for EU GDPR, UK GDPR, CCPA, and the Australian Privacy Act. SCALE TO TEAMS - Plans built for teams of all sizes. - Leverage digital business cards, email signatures, and virtual backgrounds to present your brand consistently and generate and capture leads to grow your business. ABOUT HIHELLO HiHello is changing how everyone—from individuals to Fortune 500 companies—manages their most important contacts. It starts with a digital business card built from the ground up to be delightful, customizable, and secure. HiHello’s digital business cards unlock new opportunities, cut the costs of traditional cards, and have a positive environmental impact. Millions of professionals worldwide trust HiHello to amplify the power of their network, and we’re just getting started!

raw_data.description: HiHello: The Best Digital Business Card App Join the future of networking with HiHello, the leading digital business card app trusted by professionals worldwide. With over a million biz cards shared monthly, HiHello is your essential tool for building and managing valuable business connections. BEAUTIFUL & CUSTOMIZABLE BUSINESS CARD MAKER - Make and personalize interactive virtual business cards with different templates, designs, and colors. - Create stunning free electronic business cards with profile photos, or transform your vcard into a video business card. - Add unlimited content, include links, social media, video, PDF, payment apps, and more. EFFORTLESS SHARING - Share your card with anyone, even if they don’t have the HiHello app. - Share with a branded QR code, link, email, SMS, iMessage, Apple Watch, Apple Wallet, Siri, widget, lock screen widgets, social media, Airdrop, NFC, and more. BUSINESS CONTACT MANAGER - Your virtual Rolodex that helps you keep track of everyone you meet. - Manage your contact list with automated sorting, notes and tags to organize, and a timeline of who you met and when in the smart address book. - Easily save any HiHello contacts into your phone or preferred contact manager. AI-POWERED BUSINESS CARD READER, SCANNER, AND TRANSCRIPTION - Instantly capture any paper card lead with the AI-powered business card scanner. - Built on multiple AI models with a human verification backup if needed, HiHello is the most accurate business card scanner app. VIRTUAL BACKGROUNDS - Stay on brand in every meeting or presentation with custom virtual backgrounds that link to your smart business cards for virtual meetings or live streaming. - Create personalized, branded backgrounds with a photo from our library, or upload your own. - Share what you want with your audience by creating a specific card and virtual background QR code for your meeting or presentation. EMAIL SIGNATURES - Create professional, interactive, attention-grabbing signatures that are compatible with any email platform and correspond to your business card of choice. - Choose from multiple templates and styles. ANALYTICS - Gain valuable insights into card usage, engagement, and lead generation with in-app analytics and data integrations. INTEGRATIONS - Integrate HiHello with the systems that matter most, including SSO, Active Directory, and CRMs like Salesforce and Hubspot. SECURITY & PRIVACY - HiHello is SOC 2 Type 2 compliant and meets the privacy requirements for EU GDPR, UK GDPR, CCPA, and the Australian Privacy Act. SCALE TO TEAMS - Plans built for teams of all sizes. - Leverage digital business cards, email signatures, and virtual backgrounds to present your brand consistently and generate and capture leads to grow your business. ABOUT HIHELLO HiHello is changing how everyone—from individuals to Fortune 500 companies—manages their most important contacts. It starts with a digital business card built from the ground up to be delightful, customizable, and secure. HiHello’s digital business cards unlock new opportunities, cut the costs of traditional cards, and have a positive environmental impact. Millions of professionals worldwide trust HiHello to amplify the power of their network, and we’re just getting started!

apps.title: North One - Business Banking
apps.description: North One is a Business Checking Account that simplifies your banking experience, allowing you to focus on what matters most—growing your business. Simplify your finances with one Account Access all the essential banking features you need without the usual fees, branch visits, or paperwork. With the North One app, you can: - Earn money back on your Mastercard® Small Business Debit Card purchases - Send and receive payments any time with Standard ACH, Same-day ACH, wire transfers, paper checks⁶, & more - Apply for a Business Line of Credit and Business Term Loan⁴ - Receive payments instantly from Stripe, Cash App, Square, Amazon, PayPal, Venmo, and more⁵ - Bank anywhere, any time - Enjoy low fees and high limits - Buy with physical and virtual debit cards - Invite your accountant, bookkeeper, and team members - Free inbound wires - Give each of your co-owners their own login and debit card - Millions of ATMs with fee refunds - Deposit cash at over 90,000 retail locations⁷ - Talk to a local Customer Care expert who understands your business North One is a financial technology company, not a bank. Banking services for the deposit account provided by The Bancorp Bank, N.A., Member FDIC. The NorthOne Mastercard® Small Business Debit Card is issued by The Bancorp Bank, N.A., Member FDIC, pursuant to license by Mastercard International Incorporated. Mastercard and the circles design are registered trademarks of Mastercard International Incorporated. Card may be used everywhere Mastercard is accepted. All trademarks and brand names belong to their respective owners. Use of these trademarks and brand names do not represent endorsement by or association with this card program. 1. Based on North One user data. Time saved compared to sending the same type of payment at a traditional bank. Learn how we calculate time saved here: help.northone.com/en/articles/9095567-time-saved-counter 2. Applicable to the North One Standard Plan. Optional North One Plus Plan available for $20/month. 3. North One does not charge a fee for this service, but may reimburse you for third-party fees charged. You must contact the North One Customer Care Team to request reimbursement. Some restrictions apply. 4. North One is a financial technology company, not a lender. North One does not issue loans or make credit decisions in connection with loans. North One Lending is powered by Kanmon. All loans are subject to credit approval. Your terms may vary. North One Lending loans are issued by Kanmon, a licensed lender. California Loans are made pursuant to a Department of Financial Protection and Innovation California Lenders Law License. Read more about Kanmon at kanmon.com. 5. Real Time Payments are available through The Clearing House Payments Company, LLC and generally occur within seconds, however certain circumstances could result in a delay or cancellation of a payment. See your Deposit Account Agreement for more details. 6. See Deposit Account Agreement for details on ACH transfers, Same-day ACH transfers, mobile check deposit, physical checks, domestic wire transfers, and third party cash transfers (subject to terms and conditions of GreenDot® Corporation). 7. Cash deposits are subject to terms and conditions of Green Dot Corporation. © Green Dot Corporation. Green Dot is a registered trademark of Green Dot Corporation. The retailer that receives your cash will be responsible to transfer the funds for deposit into your North One Account.

apps.title: Privat24 for business
apps.description: "Privat24 for business" is a mobile application for legal entities and private entrepreneurs. Key features: • Account management: view statements, monitor income and spendings, analyze cash flow. • Payments: pay contractors, suppliers, and partners quickly and securely. Payment templates are available for optimization. • Electronic document management: create and send invoices, exchange documents with suppliers. • Currency exchange operations: buy, sell, and convert foreign currency at the current exchange rate without visiting a bank. Enable notifications for the start of the trading session to perform necessary operations timely. • Tax payments: automatically receive data from the State Tax Service, pay taxes, fees, and other mandatory payments. Activate payment deadline reminders to pay on time. • Reporting: sign and submit reports to the State Tax Service within the app, use the Reporting calendar and automatic data completion for tax calculation. • Salary projects: manage salary payments to employees on PrivatBank or other Ukrainian bank cards. • Loans and deposits: monitor the status of loan agreements, apply for new loans, and open / replenish / close deposits online. • Business cards: open corporate cards, track transactions, and set limits. • Notifications: receive instant notifications for all incoming and outgoing funds. • Security: the app has enhanced fraud protection, including the use of device data to prevent unauthorized actions. • Instant login via Face ID / Touch ID. • SmartID: your qualified electronic signature for securely signing payments and documents. The app includes a special section for connecting with PrivatBank: • Online chat support. • Option to call the bank within the app or request a callback. • Review the history of inquiries to the bank. • Reporting fraud. • Connect via Telegram or Viber. We also provide sign language consultations via video chat for clients with hearing impairments. "Privat24 for business" is your reliable assistant for managing your business from anywhere in the world. We are constantly improving the functionality and interface. We appreciate your feedback at: p24b_mobile@privatbank.ua

apps.title: Saby Business
apps.description: Detailed analytics on the company operation, overall insights for the whole company and by each locality. •Sales trends–the amount of revenue, quantity and average spend, comparison by period. •Money reports–balance on accounts, in cash registers and on deposit. •Cash flow analysis–inflows and outflows, payments to vendors, and employee wages. •Product rating–by revenue, volume and frequency of sales. •Cashiers’ efficiency–see your top-sellers and those who are behind, decide on bonuses or penalties. •Reporting to government agencies–view and file reports, use the Saby calendar to see what to file next, and keep track of document statuses. •Recognition of primary accounting documents–just take photos or upload your documents. Saby will recognize a consignment note and record the items against a proper warehouse or use the invoice photo to issue a payment order. •Video surveillance–use your smartphone instead of a video surveillance point, wherever you have the Internet connection. •All about companies–company details, owners, financial state, business value and other up-to-date information about companies in your region and Russia. •Notifications–get alerts on cash register issues, receipts with manully entered discounts and other questionable transactions, all with video recordings attached. More about Saby: https://saby.ru/retailFollow the news and leave your comments and suggestions in our group: https://n.saby.ru/retail

apps.title: Business Card Reader
apps.description: ABBYY Business Card Reader –The World’s Fastest Business Card Scanner & Contact Management App for iPhone and iPad! Recommended by The New York Times, CNN, The Telegraph, Computer Business Review, Macworld. Winner of the RISING STAR Award in the Mobile Star Awards ABBYY Business Card Reader easily & simply captures & stores contact from business cards in 25 languages to your iPhone and iPad. The recognized data can be saved in either your device contacts or the app digital storage. KEY FEATURES • QUICK AND ACCURATE SCANNING ABBYYs optical character recognition technology provides quick & accurate recognition of all contact information: names, organizations, phone numbers, e-mail addresses, etc. • AUTO-CLICK PHOTO FEATURE Automatically focuses on the business card, detects its edges, crops any extraneous background & captures an image of the card all by itself. • EASY CHECK OF RECOGNIZED DATA The app highlights “unusual” characters with blue color and displays the original image so that you can quickly confirm the output of the app. • APPLE WATCH APP. You won’t need to reach for your iPhone or iPad to remember somebody’s name. View contacts and make phone calls right from BCR on your Apple Watch! • AUTOMATIC NORMALIZATION OF PHONE AND EXTENTION NUMBERS BCR will automatically put in all the missing parts so that you can reach the contact even if the country code was omitted in print. • AUTOCOMPLETION OF ADDRESSES BCR corrects any typos and fills in the missing address fields so you can easily find it on the map. • MANUAL BACKUPS. Manual backups to archive and restore to another device. • Export contacts to Salesforce Leads (premium account required). BCR can export business cards to Enterprise, Unlimited, and Performance Editions of SF license. Professional Edition does not allow BCR export. • Set up voice commands in Siri Shortcuts app to open business cards by voicing the name of the owner. • Spotlight Search to find business cards from BCR • Export business cards to MS Excel in .CSV format. • Smart Facebook and LinkedIn search: connect social media account to the business card and auto upload photo of contact from Facebook. • Search in iPhone Maps for the address of your contacts. • Exchange digitally and forward recognized contacts via e-mail as VCard or JPEG files or via SMS as a plain text. • Share your contacts using QR code. • Support 25 languages including recognition of multilingual cards. - French - German - Greek - Japanese - Indonesian - Italian - Korean - Norwegian (both Bokmal and Nynorsk) - Polish - Portuguese (Portugal) - Portuguese (Brazil) - Russian - Spanish - Swedish - Turkish - Ukrainian The free version provides 10 card recognition. Enable Premium to get unlimited functionality: • Unlimited business card recognition • Export to Excel • No ads Premium Account auto-renewable subscription allows using all functions of this app. Subscription length periods: 1 month with 7 days free trial, and 1 year. The subscription is automatically renewed at the end of the period unless you choose to cancel the subscription at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. You can manage your subscription and switch off the auto-renewal by accessing your Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription to that publication. Read us: abbyy.com/blog/mobile Facebook.com/ABBYYsoft Twitter @ABBYY_Software YouTube.com/ABBYYvideos Privacy Policy abbyy.com/privacy Terms of Use abbyybcr.com/en/eula Looking forward to your feedback on the App Store!

apps.title: Ramp
apps.description: Ramp is the finance automation platform designed to save you time and money. With Ramp you get corporate cards, expense management, bill payments, accounting automation and reporting—all in one easy-to-use solution. Ramp Mobile puts finance automation in your pocket. Pay for expenses quickly with your corporate card at your fingertips. Submit expense reports and reimbursements on the go by taking a picture of your receipt and tapping in a memo or other submission requirements. Plus, with simplified visibility, you’ll always have the information you need on expense policies, recent transactions, or spend requests. App Features: - View & lock your cards - Add to Apple Wallet - Request new spend or temporary spend increase - Take a picture of your receipt and auto-match to transaction - Submit additional requirements like memos & accounting fields - Book flights and hotels with Ramp Travel - Request reimbursements - View all transactions & spend requests - See your expense policy - Set communication preferences - Dark/light themes

apps.title: MileIQ: Mileage Tracker & Log
apps.description: Track and Record Mileage Automatically and Maximize your Tax Reimbursement with MileIQ MileIQ is the #1 automatic mileage tracker app, trusted by millions of users to simplify productivity, tax preparation, expense tracking, and financial planning. Whether you're self-employed, a small business owner, or part of a team, MileIQ simplifies mileage tracking so you can focus on growing your business. Save time, maximize tax deductions and reimbursements, and generate IRS-compliant reports—without the hassle of manual logs. Smart, Automatic Mileage Tracking Stop wasting time on manual mileage logs. MileIQ’s smart mile tracker uses GPS-powered tracking that runs in the background, automatically recording every business and personal drive to streamline your reimbursement. Add custom labels, notes, and purposes to keep your mileage records organized. Maximize Your Tax Deductions Turn miles into tax savings with MileIQ. Automatically calculate business and personal mileage. Easily generate IRS-compliant reports for easy write-offs, reimbursements, and Schedule C or 1099 filings. Skip the spreadsheets—export logs in seconds and join millions who’ve saved $10B+ using MileIQ. Flexible Categorization & Customization Quickly classify your drives with MileIQ’s smart mile tracker, swiping right for business and left for personal. Need more control? Customize categories to match your workflow and stay aligned with your unique needs. Boost productivity by keeping everything organized in one app. Add detailed trip purposes like client meetings, supply runs, or business errands to support tax audit readiness. Key Features of MileIQ: - Automatic mileage calculator & tracking with smart GPS technology. - Accurate drive classification for business or personal purposes. - IRS-compliant mileage reports for tax preparation. - Exportable summaries to assist with tax filings and financial statements. - Monthly and annual summaries to simplify financial planning. - Secure cloud storage to access your recorded data anytime, anywhere. - User-friendly interface designed for productivity and ease of use provides hassle-free navigation. Who Can Benefit from MileIQ? - Freelancers and self-employed professionals: Simplify 1099 tax preparation and focus on growing your business. - Small business owners: Gain insights into mileage expenses and streamline reimbursements. - Sales professionals: Track business miles and ensure accurate billing. - Rideshare and delivery drivers: Maximize deductions and keep accurate records effortlessly. - Employees with mileage reimbursements: Ensure accurate reporting for reimbursements. - Tax professionals and bookkeepers: Access organized mileage data to support filings and audits. Why Choose MileIQ? - Trusted by millions of users worldwide—Featured in Forbes, Entrepreneur, and The New York Times - Accurate, reliable, and designed to save you time and money. - 100 Billion+ Miles Logged - Users saved $10 Billion+ in Reimbursements - 80,000+ 5-star reviews for simplicity, functionality, and effectiveness. - Unlimited mileage tracking with 40 free drives every month Start Tracking Your Miles Today! Download MileIQ and join a community of professionals saving time and money with smarter mileage tracking. Don’t leave your deductions on the road—make every mile count with MileIQ. Unlock Premium Features: Upgrade to MileIQ Premium for unlimited mileage tracking, advanced reporting tools, and enhanced productivity features. Start with a free trial and experience the benefits today. Your Mileage. Your Savings. Take control of your finances with the ultimate mileage tracker app. Download MileIQ now and drive your way to more savings, smarter tax preparation and financial planning. Start driving smarter today. You can find our Privacy Policy at https://mileiq.com/privacy Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Features included with your service: • Local and long distance calling to the U.S. and Canada* • Free Voicemail • Free SMS texting • Free Conference Bridge • Enhanced Call Management / Forwarding • Caller ID & Caller ID Blocking • 3-Way Calling • Call Waiting • Do Not Disturb • NEW! Shared company contacts – create and share business contacts between your company accounts to ensure you never miss an opportunity! apps.title: Laundry Tycoon - Business Sim
apps.description: Looking for tycoon games? Laundry Tycoon – Business Sim is a business simulator game where you run a laundry business. You make money on washing and cleaning clothes. But to succeed you need to prove yourself as a manager! Grow your business fast to become a business tycoon. This business simulator game is really easy to play. You are a laundry manager. Simply get dirty clothes from customers and put it in the washing machine. Then take the clean clothes and give it back to get paid. The more clothes you wash the more money you get. At first, you run the laundry by yourself. But then you need help to cope with the influx of customers and their dirty clothes. Thus, you have to do more than in most of the other cleaning games. You need to manage people for success! Get a HR Specialist to hire first workers. This will help you get rid of your laundry routine and focus on your business. Sometimes you will need to contact the HR department to hire new employees and improve your staff’s hard skills. Indeed, don’t forget to improve your hero skills! Go to the manager desk to increase your speed and upgrade your hero to do the laundry faster. Also, upgrade the speed of the washing machines. Wash more clothes to earn more. Money will help to grow faster and build your own laundry empire. WHAT ELSE? - Level up your business. Enlarge your laundry space and buy more washing machines. Build your successful business and leave your competitors behind. - Get CEO. Hire CEO to work with customers and get you rid of the routine. Instead, focus on marketing and profits. Invest more money in advertising to attract more customers. Improve your service quality. This will allow you to rise prices and to become a business tycoon. - Serve VIP customers. Wanna make even more money? Wash clothes for VIPs and get gold for your work. The richer men you attract the faster your dream will come true! Download Laundry Tycoon – Business Sim, pump your laundry business up and become a millionaire tycoon!

apps.description: Keep your work life separate from your personal life by getting a dedicated business phone number for calls, texts, and contact management. With NextivaONE, you can connect with your customers and team using unlimited voice calling within the US and Canada. Additionally, you can send texts using your business phone number. Key features include: * Unlimited calling (US and Canada) * Mobile texting (SMS/MMS) * Mobile contact management * Contacts integration * Business voicemail * Free number porting * Free local and toll-free numbers * 24/7 customer support Join over 100,000 Nextiva customers who rely on the most dependable network in the industry.

apps.title: ABBYY Business Card Reader Pro
apps.description: ABBYY Business Card Reader Pro –The World’s Fastest Business Card Scanner & Contact Management App for iPhone and iPad! Recommended by The New York Times, CNN, The Telegraph, Computer Business Review, Macworld. Winner of the RISING STAR Award in the Mobile Star Awards ABBYY Business Card Reader Pro easily & simply captures & stores contact from business cards in 25 languages to your iPhone and iPad. The recognized data can be saved in either your device contacts or the app digital storage. KEY FEATURES • QUICK AND ACCURATE SCANNING ABBYYs optical character recognition technology provides quick & accurate recognition of all contact information: names, organizations, phone numbers, e-mail addresses, etc. • AUTO-CLICK PHOTO FEATURE Automatically focuses on the business card, detects its edges, crops any extraneous background & captures an image of the card all by itself. • EASY CHECK OF RECOGNIZED DATA The app highlights “unusual” characters with blue color and displays the original image so that you can quickly confirm the output of the app. • APPLE WATCH APP. You won’t need to reach for your iPhone or iPad to remember somebody’s name. View contacts and make phone calls right from BCR on your Apple Watch! • AUTOMATIC NORMALIZATION OF PHONE AND EXTENTION NUMBERS BCR will automatically put in all the missing parts so that you can reach the contact even if the country code was omitted in print. • AUTOCOMPLETION OF ADDRESSES BCR corrects any typos and fills in the missing address fields so you can easily find it on the map. • MANUAL BACKUPS. Manual backups to archive and restore to another device. • Export contacts to Salesforce Leads (premium account required). BCR can export business cards to Enterprise, Unlimited, and Performance Editions of SF license. Professional Edition does not allow BCR export. • Set up voice commands in Siri Shortcuts app to open business cards by voicing the name of the owner. • Spotlight Search to find business cards from BCR • Export business cards to MS Excel in .CSV format. • Smart Facebook and LinkedIn search: connect social media account to the business card and auto upload photo of contact from Facebook. • Search in iPhone Maps for the address of your contacts. • Exchange digitally and forward recognized contacts via e-mail as VCard or JPEG files or via SMS as a plain text. • Share your contacts using QR code. • Support 25 languages including recognition of multilingual cards. - French - German - Greek - Japanese - Indonesian - Italian - Korean - Norwegian (both Bokmal and Nynorsk) - Polish - Portuguese (Portugal) - Portuguese (Brazil) - Russian - Spanish - Swedish - Turkish - Ukrainian Read us: abbyy.com/blog/mobile Facebook.com/ABBYYsoft Twitter @ABBYY_Software YouTube.com/ABBYYvideos Privacy Policy abbyy.com/privacy Terms of Use abbyybcr.com/en/eula Looking forward to your feedback on the App Store!
